title: $2900 a month includes electricity
posting_body: ['Spacious multi-level', '3 Bedroom Apartment', 'Available on 9/1 or if preferred 10/1', '$2900 a month includes electricity', 'A very spacious multi-level 3 bedroom apartment in a secure owner-occupied two-family house.', 'Amenities include:', 'No Broker or Realtor Fee', 'Electricity included in rent', 'Brand new In-unit washer & dryer (arriving 8/16)', 'Central Air conditioning', 'Ceiling fans throughout', 'Dishwasher', 'Stainless appliances', 'Hardwood floors', 'Porcelain tile', 'Tons of natural light', 'Pantry (washer&dryer plus extra storage)', 'Ample sized closets in the eaves', 'Cable wired ready', 'Newly painted hallway', 'Located within steps to the #120 bus line, short walk to the Wood Island (Blue line) train station and a quick 5-minute drive to Logan Airport and Sumner/Ted Williams tunnels.', 'First month plus $2000 security deposit upon signing of a 1 year lease (required)', 'No smoking allowed in or around the property', 'No pets allowed (sorry)', 'On-street parking (resident sticker)', 'Filling out an Application and Background check is essential to occupancy', 'Please email me with any questions or to schedule a viewing (beginning August 2nd)', 'Serious inquiries ONLY', 'Ps “Please recycle”']
